abstract: San Antonio Spurs guard Tony Parker will play for France in Olympic qualifying tournament, having reached agreement with his pregnant wife, who is expected to give birth in same month; other basketball news noted.

headline.main: Tony Parker Set for Olympic Bid

snippet: Spurs point guard Tony Parker has reached an understanding with his pregnant wife that will allow him to take part in France’s Olympic qualifying tournament in July.
lead_paragraph: Spurs point guard Tony Parker has reached an understanding with his pregnant wife that will allow him to take part in France’s Olympic qualifying tournament in July.
